sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import HealthInsuranceCard from './HealthInsuranceCard'; import LifeInsuranceCard from './LifeInsuranceCard'; import CyberInsuranceCard from './CyberInsuranceCard'; const InsuranceCardsDemo: React.FC = () => { return (

Insurance Cards Demo

Hover over the Health, Life, and Cyber insurance cards to see the expansion effects

All cards expand vertically and cover the next card below them, showing relevant statistics

{/* Demo Grid */}
{/* Health Insurance Card - Interactive */}
{/* Life Insurance Card - Interactive */}
{/* Travel Card */}

Travel

Roam the globe,
worry-free

{/* Cyber Insurance Card - Interactive */}
{/* Features List */}

Features Implemented

  • Vertical hover expansion effect with smooth transitions
  • Health, Life, and Cyber cards expand to cover the next card below them
  • Healthcare, life insurance, and cyber security statistics content with bullet points
  • Cubic-bezier easing for smooth animations
  • Z-index layering for proper hover state
  • Responsive design that works on mobile
{/* Content Details */}

Content Details

Health Card Statistics:

  • Indians still pay 45.98% of all healthcare costs out-of-pocket one medical bill can wipe out savings.
  • ₹ 70,558 — average health-claim size in FY 24, up 11% YoY thanks to medical inflation.

Life Card Statistics:

  • 85% of Indian families have no life insurance coverage, leaving loved ones financially vulnerable.
  • Average life insurance coverage is only ₹2.5 lakhs, insufficient for family's future needs.

Cyber Card Statistics:

  • SMBs are now the #1 target for hackers fewer resources, bigger pay-outs.
  • India was the #2 most-attacked nation in 2024
); }; export default InsuranceCardsDemo;
